resources.string:
Hello! My name is Joshua San Jose T. Madroño and this is my About Me page created in Android Studio. I am currently learning how to use layouts such as ScrollView, LinearLayout, and TextView. This is for my Mobile Applications Development class or ITCC 41 section B.
I enjoy programming, designing apps, and learning new things about technology especially with Maam Guen! In the very near future, I want to build more Android applications with interactive features to have a successful career like Maam Guen.
If I was a dinosaur, I will rawrrrrrrrrrrrr always!! Hehe If I go back 3 years ago, I would still pick me!
Thank you for very much!
